data.title: Ali vs. Patterson, Las Vegas, 1965
data.meta_description: An image of Muhammad Ali fighting Floyd Patterson in 1965 in Las Vegas, Nevada. The image shows Ali landing a left handed punch, while Patterson has both arms up to block the hit. Ali stands to the left of the photograph, Patterson to the right. The two are at the center of the ring and the referee, Harold Krause, looks on from near the ropes. The ring is surrounded by photographers and spectators.
data.meta_site_name: National Museum of African American History and Culture
data.text:

Photograph by

Iooss, Walter Jr., American, born 1943

Subject of

Ali, Muhammad, American, 1942 - 2016

Patterson, Floyd, American, 1935 - 2006

Medium

digital

Dimensions

H x W: 3369 pixels × 5000 pixels

File size: 48.25 MB

Description

An image of Muhammad Ali fighting Floyd Patterson in 1965 in Las Vegas, Nevada. The image shows Ali landing a left handed punch, while Patterson has both arms up to block the hit. Ali stands to the left of the photograph, Patterson to the right. The two are at the center of the ring and the referee, Harold Krause, looks on from near the ropes. The ring is surrounded by photographers and spectators.

Place depicted

Las Vegas, Clark County, Nevada, United States, North and Central America
